atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities and variants styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Use the @theme directive to define custom design tokens for Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @import
atDirectives.description: Use @import to import other CSS files.
